title: Beware the Batman: Shadows of Gotham - Part 1 2014 DVDR NTSC P2P
description:
Another night falls on Gotham and the Dark Knight ever vigilant carefully observes his city and its citizens . With the help of his butler Alfred a former secret agent and assassin Katana , one expert in the use of the sword , Batman embodies a relentless fight against the evil criminal underworld of Gotham .
Get ready to enjoy the amazing adventures of Batman in his fight against the terrible machinations of Professor Pyg , Magpie , Mister Toad and master criminal , Anarky .
Great adventures of fighting crime with hidden clues , leading edge technology and suspense , as Batman walks the shadows , ready to dispense justice and action !
